scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:api" "npm run dev:frontend"
scripts.build:all: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run build" "cd backend/api && npm run build" "cd backend/auth && npm run build"
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:setup
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/api && npm install && cd ../auth && npm install
scripts.db:setup: cd backend/api && npx prisma generate && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: cd backend/api && npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.clean:start: npm run ports:kill && sleep 2 && npm run dev
